titles.title: Drug-Free Parks and Recreation Facilities Act of 1988

A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to make the maximum penalty for distributing or manufacturing a controlled substance in or near a park or recreational facility commensurate with the maximum penalty for distributing or manufacturing a controlled substance in or near a school.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 10/6/1988--Introduced. Drug-Free Parks and Recreation Facilities Act of 1988 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to impose enhanced penalties for distribution or manufacture of controlled substances in or near public recreational facilities.
